acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped boolean values with @PodamBooleanValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleBooleanValuesWithThePodamBooleanValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.BooleanValuePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the boolean value true should be true
The boolean value false should be false
Then the Object should not be null
The boolean value false should be false
Then the Object should not be null
Then the boolean value true should be true
